title: Bellefonte Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe in a converted two-story house. Laid-back atmosphere with free Wi-Fi. Sunday is brunch with live music. Owners are vegan aware. Menu includes a vegan Tofurky melt and vegan chorizo tacos; has vegan dessert. Could ask to modify a sandwich to vegan by requesting vegan cheese/sour cream, veganaise, and meat substitutes. Full bar with beer on tap.
